pullrequest.title: Ubuntu debug package generation ready (need final test inside jenkins)

content.raw: Looks good, but I'm worried that setting the `CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE` to `Debug` will remove optimization flags (`-O`).  And we really care about performance, so we don't want to sacrifice optimizations.  We'd rather have slightly less useful debug information than poor performance for all users.
content.html: Looks good, but I'm worried that setting the CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE to Debug will remove optimization flags (-O). And we really care about performance, so we don't want to sacrifice optimizations. We'd rather have slightly less useful debug information than poor performance for all users.

pullrequest.title: Ubuntu debug package generation ready (need final test inside jenkins)

content.raw: @gerkey this pull is ready to be merged. It would be nice to find a way of testing this new packages (inside a jenkins work) before releasing them to users. We could run a fake debbuild without uploading to the repo the new packages.
